Ugh, Dewboy its things like that, that would make the council paranoid. As 
far as im concerned the cybertronian citizens would definatey be banned from 
doing stuff like that. I believe that all major factions would be controled 
by one council member. Like whoever on the council has the most preds would 
control pred Military and citizens jointly with predacon playerds. A maximal 
biast council member would do the same, vok/alliance would do the same, and 
whatever else there is. Make a story to go with things and voila.

--part1_f6.12adc5b7.292d77ab_boundary
